welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Whippany, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic landmarks, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and discover all that this hidden gem has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A is primarily used by domestic and international airlines, including United Airlines and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is primarily used by domestic and international airlines, including American Airlines and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Terminal C is primarily used by United Airlines and international airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves commercial flights and private charters.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private jets and VIP travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to private and corporate jets, offering luxurious facilities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by American Airlines, American Eagle, and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Air Canada, Southwest Airlines, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by JetBlue and Spirit Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights operated by Alaska Airlines, Frontier Airlines, and WestJet.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport. Users must agree to terms and conditions to access the network.
